meanings.definition: Helios: the ancient Greek god of the sun
meanings.sent1: In Greek mythology, Helios rode his chariot across the sky every day.
meanings.sent2: The statue of Helios in the park symbolizes the power of the sun.
meanings.sent3: The children dressed up as Helios for the school play, shining brightly in their costumes.
meanings.sent4: As majestic as Helios himself, the sunrise painted the sky in vibrant colors.
meanings.sent5: The warmth of Helios's rays enveloped the land, bringing life to all living things.

meanings.definition: Helios: relating to the sun or sunlight
meanings.sent1: The helios energy panels on the roof harness the power of the sun for electricity.
meanings.sent2: She wore a helios hat to shield her eyes from the bright sunlight.
meanings.sent3: The helios flowers bloomed beautifully under the warm sun's rays.
meanings.sent4: The helios glow of the sunset painted the sky in shades of orange and pink.
meanings.sent5: The helios warmth of the summer day made everyone feel cheerful and energetic.
